IMDB gives this film a 6.7, but that's kind of underrating it. It's one of the more original teen comedies of the 80's. Probably deserves a rating somewhere in the 7.0-7.5 range.
It's not a teen comedy, as it's set at a technical college, not a high-school.

I'm sorry, I re-registered just to write this comment, aren't freshman and sophomore college students usually 18 or 19? Is that not teenage enough for you? Besides, the supporting character is about 15 or 16 as I remember, I've not yet watched it again, but you seem like you haven't watched it at all. He was super-smart and was admitted early. Anyways, thanks for the upload, even if you don't know what you're talking about..
